name: transmittable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be passed or sent from one person, thing, or place to another: Malaria is a dangerous, easily transmittable disease known to be carried by mosquitoes. Our pets may be host to a long list of diseases and parasites that are easily transmittable to humans. The file can be converted into a format that is easily transmittable over the network. Compare
transmissible
More examplesFewer examplesBirds carry more than 60 transmittable diseases.The above type N-Code is transmittable wirelessly onto mobile devices.The truth - the Eternal Truth - is not transmittable by words.
